c74object.name: tap.ifft~
c74object.digest: Windowed and overlapped Inverse Fast Fourier Transform
c74object.description: The tap.ifft~ object is a wrapper for MSP's FFT and IFFT objects. These objects deal with creating, overlapping and windowing the FFTs and IFFTs. Historical Note: these abstractions were developed back in the days of Max 3.5.9 and MSP 1, before the advent of the pfft~ object.

objarg.name: fftsizeovertwo
objarg.description: Half the size of the FFT.
